The photograph was circulated on social: implying that the Clintons' association with Yasser Arafat would be controversial for them.
Yasser Arafat was the Chairman of the Pa: PLO) and President of the Palestinian National Authority (PNA), and President Bill Clinton was involved in negotiations with Arafat and Israeli leaders during his term to seek peace in the Middle East.
The photograph was taken during a gather: where meetings focused on advancing the Middle East peace process took place between President Clinton, Israeli prime minister Ehud Barak, and Palestinian president Arafat. The image was cropped to mislead viewers into thinking the Clintons were posing alone with Arafat, when they were actually posing with Turkish president Suleyman Demirel as well.
Snopes: com, founded by David Mikkelson in 1994, provided the analysis and verification of the claim's authenticity.
